citations.narrative:
The facility has discussed emergency planning but at time of the inspection has not yet documented the plan .
Documentation of the plan is important to ensure that employees have needed information in case of an emergency that
would be detrimental to the well being of the animals . The plan must be documented , reviewed annually and all
employees trained on the plan within 30 days of employment.
CORRECT BY : 8/19/2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility employees..

narrative:
2.134(a) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The facility has discussed emergency planning but at time of the inspection has not yet documented the plan . 
Documentation of the plan is important to ensure that employees have needed information in case of an emergency that 
would be detrimental to the well being of the animals . The plan must be documented , reviewed annually and all 
employees trained on the plan within 30 days of employment.  
CORRECT BY : 8/19/2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility employees.. 
 
 n
